id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node

disabled.label: advanced
disabled.description: Whether to disable this EIP from the route during build time. Once an EIP has been disabled then it cannot be enabled later at runtime.

ref.description: Reference to the Processor to lookup in the registry to use. Can also be used for creating new beans by their class name by prefixing with #class, eg #class:com.foo.MyClassType. And it is also possible to refer to singleton beans by their type in the registry by prefixing with #type: syntax, eg #type:com.foo.MyClassType
